format: A data frame with 700 observations on the following 6 variables.
title: 3 Measures of ability: SATV, SATQ, ACT
description:
Description
Self reported scores on the SAT Verbal, SAT Quantitative and ACT   were collected as part of the Synthetic Aperture Personality Assessment (SAPA) web based personality assessment project.  Age, gender, and education are also reported. The data from 700 subjects are included here as a demonstration set for correlation and analysis.
reference: These items were collected as part of the  SAPA  project  (https://www.sapa-project.org/) to develop online measures of ability (Revelle, Wilt and Rosenthal, 2009).  The score means are higher than national norms suggesting both self selection for people taking on line personality and ability tests and a self reporting bias in scores.

parameters.SATV: SAT Verbal scores may range from 200 - 800.
parameters.education: self reported education 1 = high school ... 5 = graduate work
parameters.SATQ: SAT Quantitative scores may range from 200 - 800
parameters.ACT: ACT composite scores may range from 1 - 36.  National norms have a mean of 20.
